script:
1). How do I get to the employees' lounge?
I've already had lunch.
It's seven feet by eight feet.
Down the hall and to the right. 
2). You'll turn off the lights when you leave, won't you?
Yes, I won't.
Sure, no problem. 
Yes, I'll turn them on.
3). Didn't you order new supplies?
Yes, I ordered them Tuesday. 
I need some paper and pens.
No, we don't have any old ones.
